period

Interface PeriodMaker

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PeriodMakerAbstract, PeriodMakerImplCSV, PeriodMakerImplSQL

    public interface PeriodMaker
    A class implementing the PeriodMaker interface needs to: - Capture a desired period name from the user. - Create a period space on a particular location. - Associate the period created to a particular configuration and userSpace. - Persistent storage and retrieval of elements associated with a period.

    • Method Detail

      • makePeriod

        void makePeriod(java.util.Scanner sc,
                java.lang.String configName)
        Captures desired period name from user, associates period to a particular configuration and UserSpace, creates a Period space.
        Parameters:
        sc - is a scanner to capture user input.
        configName - is the configuration to be associated with the period.

      • save

        void save()
        Persistent storage of all elements associated with a period.

      • capture

        boolean capture(java.lang.String periodName)
        Retrieval of elements associated with a period.
        Parameters:
        periodName - holds the name of the period wishing to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        a Boolean true if all the elements associated with a period were successfully retrieved, false if any of them failed.

      • getConfiguration

        ConfigurationManagerAbstract getConfiguration()
        Returns:
        a ConfigurationManagerAbstract object associated with this period.

      • getPeriod

        java.io.File getPeriod()
        Returns:
        a File document associated with this period.

      • getBpaCosts

        java.io.File getBpaCosts()
        Returns:
        a File document hosting the BpaCosts for this period.

      • setBpaCosts

        void setBpaCosts(java.io.File bpaCosts)
        Parameters:
        bpaCosts - BPA File to associate with this period.

      • setClientCosts

        void setClientCosts(java.io.File clientCosts)
        Parameters:
        clientCosts - Client File to associate with this period.

      • getClientCosts

        java.io.File getClientCosts()
        Returns:
        the ClienCosts file associated with this period.

      • getPeriodFiles

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.io.File> getPeriodFiles()
        Returns:
        a map encapsulating all the source files needed to run a period.

      • getDriversMap

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getDriversMap()
        Returns:
        a map with the unique value set of general ledger dimension(s) of interest and their associated BPA source for this period.
